devdoc.author: Balaji Pachai
devdoc.details: SalesContract that is intended to facilitate the trade of ERC721 tokens

buy(uint256,uint256,bool).details: Function that initiates the buying of an asset(ERC721 token to be specific).

params._estimatedTaxAndShipmentAmount: The estimation of tax + shipment amount.

params.addressFT: The address of the ERC20 contract.
params.addressNFT: The address of the ERC721 contract.

getTaxAndShipmentAmount(address,uint256,.details: Function that pulls in the tax and shipment amount into the escrow.

params._amount: The sum of tax and shipment amount.

params._newBasePrice: The new base price for the asset.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

setAssetDetails(uint256,uint256,address).details: Function that sets the asset details for the given ERC721 tokenId

params.basePrice: The base price of the asset excluding the taxes and shipment charges.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: SalesContract

buyExitClause(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Function that sells the print to the funder in case of exit clause additional payment to buy

getAssetDetails(uint256).notice: Function that gets the assets details of the provided _tokenId

increaseBasePrice(uint256,uint256).notice: Function to increase the basePrice of the Asset.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.
